content.detailedDescription:
I was out on by back porch letting the dog out it was about 9 at night and i saw a flash out of the corner of my eye. i thought that it was a shooting start and then it moved back the opposite direction and stopped in a hover . i called to my mom and it shot back the other way and right back to a hover . i would say that it was at least 5 to 10 miles away . the thing that was most noticeable was the flashing and pulsing of very intense ever changing lights . when it was close to us we could see the front end was round but the lights were the weird thing . they would go from red to maroon to blue and yellow they were like the intensity of lightning i would guess . 
 we watched it between calling everyone i knew for almost 50 minutes. it would dart back and forth but only in short jumps not like when i first saw it . i even called 911 and asked if anyone had reported anything . they said no but that they would call the faa and let me know if they said anything and they never did call  back . i am not crazy i wouldnt have believeed it if i hadnt seen it .Finally we went in because it was getting cold and i looked again and it was gone  when i peeked back out the door . i tried to take pictures , but i couldnt get the stupid flash to stop working on the camera , and to be honest i was to wound up to think straight . i am not crazy and i was a skeptic , but what we saw was not like anything like anything man made i have ever seen
content.summary: Round object with many very very bright pulsating lights that changed colors aat random

content.detailedDescription:
I saw no lights, but we had reports of lights in sky and booms in earlier nights and the national guard took responsiblity for the 10pm booms and flares.
but this one shook the house at 5:30 am friday.  i don't think they have morning trainings, so i think the national guard expanation is a coverup.\

i bet there will no explanation given to this one....
content.summary: Mysterious boom again

content.detailedDescription: i watched this strange light in the sky on sorsele webcam in sweden. i stayed there for nearly an hour and it did not move. anyone know what it could be?
content.summary: I saw this on an online webcam sorsele sweden

content.detailedDescription:
on april 12, 2008 at approximately 1021pm i observed the following in ipswich, massachusetts (us). i went to let my dog outside prior to getting ready to go to work. i observed the sky to be lightly cloudy and could observe the quarter moon shining through the thin cloud cover. i then observed a yellowish, off white colored object in the distance. then almost immediately observed four lights. these lights were traveling in a northeast direction. as these lights came closer and virtually passed my position overhead, i could distinguish a dark outline of a left and a right wing. i was unable to determine the shape of the center of this aircraft (if any). these circular lights appeared to take up most of the width of the wing. as this craft passed me overhead, approximately two seconds later the object could not be seen anymore. this entire encounter lasted approximately 5-6 seconds. there was no wind and absolutely no sound to be heard. 
     at first i believed this craft to be a military test craft of some type.I have been around all types of aircraft helicopters, fighter jets and bombers and this craft was not one of those. possibly being a test craft
     i believed this craft to be roughly the same size as a commercial airbus plane, in wing span. this craft appeared to be approximately 5 to 6 thousand feet in the air and traveling at a high rate of speed. 
     incidently, approximately five minutes later i heard a rather loud jet sound coming from the south, this sound consistant with that of a fighter jet. although i could not see any other lights, this sound lasted for approximately 1 minute.
content.summary: Flying wing, two large lights on the left and right wing (4 total)

content.detailedDescription: I was taking the trash out to the curb in front of my house at 11:58 pm and as i turned to walk back in i noticed that the sky was very clear so i looked around a bit and found some constalations and a planet, i assume it was venus due to it's greenish-blue hue. i then noticed something loving high above moving ne to sw and it apeared as two lights flasing eratically. both lights moved together and one seemed to either be located above the other or one was in front of the other. the lights had no set colors and seemed to be a blend of colors changing when they flashed. there didn't seem to be any set pattern or timing to the flashes either. it was a bit dark and i couldn't make out the body of a craft due to the glare fromt he moon and a street lamp shining behind me. the object moved in a straight line at first and i thought it a plane, then it slowed to almost a halt and it then made close to a 90 degree turn and headed south. i watched as it sped up and seemed to raise in altitude as it sped of in the distance. there is alot of helecopter trafic near my house during the day but we always hear them. i heard no noise from this object and it seemed to be quite higher than the choppers usually fly around here. during the sighting i had overwhelming feelings of intrest and facination. once it left my sight i returned inside and felt a bit uneasy and out of place.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two flashing lights moving together eratically in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend for safety sake il say his name is don, were smoking a couple of butt's outside my house when our eyes were attracted toward the y by a sudden meteor shower. as we watched on we notice a creasent shaped object with a light on its tail (one single bright orange light, no flashers or headlights) it appeared out of the northern sky and skipped like a rock across a pond at trmendous velocity, tehn it dissappeared as quickly as it arrived. no sound and no jet contrails as far as i could see, i mean it was dark but i have see alot of things in the sky, every meteor shower i am out for it, ive seen meteors break up in the atmosphere ive even seen a russian satellite break up in the atmosphere, which us on the eastern seaboard were lucky enough to see several years ago. i also live near westover airforce base in mass, so i am used to seeing a wide arrange of military aircraft in the sky..I have ven seen the stealth fighter f117 and the b2 stealth bomber over heard when operations in iraq started. 

but what we saw that night was nothing like what we had seen before, the rate at witch that object was moving was staggering i say the whole event lasted only about 15 seconds and id say this thing went and i am making an educated guess, id say it coverd about 1.5-2 miles in that time frame. i am not going to make the jump of saying this came from outer space, we have some pretty groovey stuff of our own flying im sure, but whatever it was,it was not normal,and was truely wierd?
content.summary: Cresent shaped craft..Appeared coming out of the north and skipped across teh sky heading south

content.detailedDescription:
For the past few years i have been seeing things in the sky over the city of franklin. a few weeks ago i watched a multi-colored disc hover and then float across the sky at the treeline. the object made no noise. tonight while outside i witnessed it again, however, this time i noticed that it looked different than before and was a little higher in the sky. it would move, hover, move, hover, and then the lights would get really bright. one time a beam of light came out of it as a jet was flying towards it. the jet then changed direction and headed sw instead of ssw the way it had been flying. there was also a jet to the east but it stayed on the same course. the lights that were coming off this thing were unbelievable. they were so bright when the thing was moving. i was so impressed with it that i called my dad to come outside and take a look. i think he was more excited than i was.

i flipped out when i saw the photos i had taken. i have had cable for only eight days and noticed the photos looked similar to what i had seen on ufo hunters on the history channel. to make sure my camera was not acting up i took a photo of the moon and it came out normal. please use my email address if you wish additional information.

thanks,
p

p.S. i have a professional grade digital camera and have worked for the local media outlets in the past.
content.summary: "ribbon" coming off of disc

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming home after my long day at school. i was driving my car and it was around 1 am. no one was on the road so i was a little scared and had my windows up and music off. suddenly when i was trying to get home quickly, i noticed a big yellow light in the sky far away. it became very huge in no time. i thought it was the moon but then i looked around to see if the moon was anywhere else and i did see the moon in the other direction so it wasnt the moon. i would say it because double the size of sun when its setting at night. it was really bright and it wasnt a star because it was too big. i kept looking at it and got a little scared since i have an astrophobia. i was driving in the direction of that thing so i slowed down my car. i got really scared and wanted to take a picture but when i took a pic i didnt see it in my phone camera, maybe because it wasnt a good quality. i kept looking at it and all of the sudden it became really big and dissappeard so quick! i tried looking for it but didnt see it anywhere
at that time i was really scared and quickly called my dad, i stopped my car and tried to catch my breath and then i drove home very scared. it was something that i have never seen before and i cant explain wat it looked like, i guess u just have to see it.
content.summary: Sharp bright yellow light twice as big as a setting sun.

content.detailedDescription:
As usual i was outside on my break, looking at the sky. i was kind of disappointed because i didn't see anything the first few times i looked during my morning break, but as i was starting to walk back into the building a flash caught my eye and a definite saucer shaped ufo was right overhead moving very erratically. it was white in appearance but i was only able to watch it for a few seconds and then it zoomed away to the west over the building in the blink of an eye ! later on in the day, i was outside on my afternoon break and i spotted 1 ufo in the eastern part of the sky. one of my fellow employees who is also a good friend just happened to come outside at that moment and i grabbed him and said "see...See ! i told you that i have been seeing these ufo's !" i directed his attention to the one that i was watching when all of a sudden another one appeared almost right next to the one we were watching and it moved on past the hovering ufo and then stopped a short distance away from the first one. it was much brighter than the first one we were watching and was blinking randomly, either from the sun glinting off it's shell or from unseen lights. then the brighter of the 2 ufo's just blinked out of existence, leaving the other one just hovering in the sky. <break> i just came back in from my last break of the day with my friend/fellow employee, and sure enough we just saw two more ufo's that just 'popped' into the sky sort of to the south from overhead. the one just sat there and hovered and the 2nd one moved away and then blinked out completely...Not faded out, but bam ! gone. so that makes a total of 5 that my friend and i saw today. i did try to bring a camera with a telephoto lens to work, but it isn't working at the moment so i'll have to try and get a different camera to film these amazing things. at least now i have another witness that is seeing these craft and not just me....Thank the gods...I still can't believe that i have been seeing so many of these craft over phoenix. why me? i have been advised to keep track of anything 'unusual' happening in my day-to-day life...For what, i have no idea but i must say that i am a bit nervous that someone said that to me. what could be more unusual than a ufo sighting on a daily basis ?!

until tomorrow then...Let's see what friday brings us. keep your eyes on the skies over phoenix my friends - something is happening and it's very exciting !

 - john birmingham - phoenix, arizona
content.summary: Star-like objects, one of them at a lower than normal altitude from my previous sightings.

content.detailedDescription:
Family member and i rounded corner northbound on top of levee near potlatch paper mill.  i saw in the sky to the east of the mill what looked like a laser pen dancing on a wall.  moved erratically over a fair distance and super fast.  the first thing i said was "could that be a model airplane flying towards us?".  i was laughed at.  the laughing stopped immediately when the object shot straight up vertically from an altitude of about 100ft to maybe 1000ft in less than a second and stopped on a dime.  we were probably over a mile away from the mill to the south (mississippi river to our east/right).  object was stationary for a few seconds.  we killed the truck and got out.  then the object came down a couple hundred feet (?) and shot east towards the river maybe a half mile, again in less that one second, and stopped.  it rose a little, and came back to the west behind the mill power tower, stopped, wiggled a little and then came in front of the tower moving back towards the river.  the lights of the mill are very bright, and this thing was multiple times brighter then anything around, and was constantly (but with no pattern that i can remember) changing colors.  no sound, no predictable speed or pattern.

we were stunned.  as we continued to watch this for what seemed like ten minutes (i'm sure it was only two or three), the object went vertical a few more times (with the same speed) and finally came back down to about 200 ft and stopped.  a few seconds later it shot off to the west towards mcgehee at the same altitude.  one can see the lights of mcgehee easily from the top of the levee.  it went out of sight over mcgehee in less than one minute (mcgehee is about 10 miles away as crow flies).

i have only told this to a few people, and my family member with me that night will not speak about it, even to me.  i have seen two other things in my time that i could not explain, but would have to rationalize weather balloons/blimps and a meteorite/satellite before i would utter "aliens".  but until i see this thing up close and someone hands me a remote control for it, it will always remain unexplained to me.  i have flown with friends who are pilots and i fully understand the science of lift and drag.  there is no aircraft anywhere that can do what we saw.

i have heard that others have seen lights at the mill before but have never talked about it with anyone else who may have seen something out there.  i am curious if anything has been seen since.
content.summary: Ball-sized sphere, very bright, very fast, colors

content.detailedDescription:
April 17, 2008.  the witness called on april 16, 2008 at 9:40 p.M. she said that on april 15 and 16 a "ship" had passed over her trailer at about 500 feet making a roaring sound and flashing lights from (apparent) antennae in red, white, blue, yellow, and green colors.  there were two of these antennae in front and one in back, all flashing the lights as bright as fireworks.  the object was gray and looked something like a helicopter, but had yellow square windows.  it moved east, west, north, and south for two to three blocks and then moved back in two to three minutes, returning directly over carol's trailer.  this happened for two consecutive nights. on both nights, the sighting lasted from 8:20 p.M. until 8:51 p.M. during the sighting carol's tv went white, but later the picture returned. she loooked around for other witnesses, but no one was outside. 

mary margaret zimmer  fl asd, fi, ssd
content.summary: Roaring object with windows and flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
Last night around 10:30 or so, i had taken our dog out.  as normal, i stood on the porch and tried to count the number of planes that i could see in the sky (we recently moved to this location where there is a very good view of the sky in several directions compared to where we had lived and you could only see the sky immediately overhead)...It struck me as odd that i couldn't see any this time.  then i looked to the north-east and notice a bright light that i at first thought was a low-flying plane...I wasn't able to get a good view at that time as it was being blocked by trees.  after it came out from behind the tree line, i noticed that i was now looking at it from a side angle and the light was just as intese from this direction.  i watched it continue it trek toward the west until it was behind the house.  at that point, i went into the back-yard and continue to watch it.  i called for my wife to verify that i was seeing something out of the norm.  now, the view was the rear of the "craft" (for lack of better word), and again, the light intensity was the same.  

i continued to watch it until it was out of site.  afterwards the realization of what just occured hit me and i realized that not once did i see any of the required strobe lights, nor, did i hear any sound either from a plane and/or a helicoptor.  i also noticed that at no point during this did i see any other planes around.  it was just surreal.  

several moments after it passed out of sight, i then noticed that there were 3 or 4 planes flying through, all of which were easily identified as a plane because even though they were definately flying at a higher altitude, but, you could clearly make out the red and blue strobing lights.

i have spoken to a good friend of mine who stated that it could have been the space station, but, this appeared to be much closer...At this point, i have no clue what i saw.  i remain somewhat skeptical, but, i guess what i saw was a ufo in it's truest sense in the fact that i can identify what it was.
content.summary: Bright sphere of light in the northern sky passing east to west

content.detailedDescription: We live a couple of blocks from the bay in fulton,texas.  on october 3rd we were walking home from a restaurant on the water when i stopped for a few minutes to just look at the stars.As i was looking up an unlit crescent shaped craft flew directly above us. it had no lights and i think it must have been flying fairly low so that the city lights reflected back from it ever so slightly. it was there long enough for me to say to my husband "oh my god...Look it's right there, it doesn't have any lights" and he looked up and saw it too. it was at least the size of my hand at arms length;as i said either very low or very large. it made no sound. it flew at about the same speed as maybe a helicopter would-not too fast or slow. we just watched it go out of sight travelling in a west/north-westerly direction. i don't know if it's related but moments before i saw the craft i had seen a shooting star over in the same direction that the craft came from. the day after i saw it i called nuforc who told me to make an internet report-we didn't have a computer then so i went to the library a week or two later and submitted a report. after all the january texas sightings i wondered whether i might need to let mufon know about what we saw back in october. it might be important for the ones who know what's really going on to know that whoever flys the crescent shaped craft were here doing whatever it is they do on october 3rd 2007.
content.summary: On a very clear dark night we were able to see an unlit crescent shaped craft fly over.
A large triangular craft (later appeared to be diamond shape) flying very slowly over my house.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in front of my home there were other people on the street i looked up to the north east sky and very high up there was a white object egg shaped i think hard to tell from so far but it wasnt a plane it was travelling very fast north to south no contrail i tried to get my husband and daughters attention to it but by the time they looked it had shot up into the atmosphere in a second  it crossed that sky very fast.    for a second, because it was so white, i thought maybe it was a seagull and i was misinterpreting its distance however when it shot  higher into the atmosphere i knew it wasnt a bird. i wish that someone else on the street was looking up but as is so typical in our society no one was looking up.  since i saw it i have been going outside looking up there 6 or 7 times a day i cant forget.  i want to see it again with someone who can tell me what it was.
content.summary: White object fast travelling across sky and then shot up very fast into atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting watching tv and heard like someone jump on my roof but it sounded like they landed with some impact.  then i ran outside to see if anyone was on my roof and noone was there.  i heard there was alot of police out on our county rode 300n north of tipton.  i had a person that told me the police were looking for wreckage from a plane that might have exploded but they didnt end up finding anything. the news is trying to cover this but it still says unexplained lights and explosion. note that reports were saying there were no planes in that area either. something about me is that i try to debunk the incident before i start saying its a ufo.  i might add that the explosion was really loud!!!   someone told me they saw seven white then chaging to orange lights in the sky above tipton and howard county. they were on there way back from howard county last night and saw some lights in the sky.  i have a feeling that this will be wrote off as an astronomical evnt, but it needes to be investigated more so we really no what happened.
content.summary: Looked like a fireball and there was a loud explosion after

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my house in south philadelphia to go to the corner store around the corner, as i walked out i looked up and saw the sun reflecting off a metalic disc shape object. i ran back in the house to grab my camera but by the time i got back outside the object was gone. to my amazement another cigar shape object was in sight this time. it was incredible that after this one, there was one after another flying overhead. i've enclosed several pics of this cool event.
content.summary: Cigar shape and disc shape objects flew over head one after another

content.detailedDescription:
i had my camcorder out and had driven to jackson morrow park to watch for the orange balls of light. i had seen them again yesterday and the weather was such that i thought tonight might be a good night to see them again. i am determined to get these bastards on video tape! i know i will.. anyway, i get to the park and shut off the lights and my car. the sun has just gone down. i sat there for about 20 minutes and got bored so i called my friend tim, in florida. i think we were on the phone for about 10 minutes when the obol showed up in the northwestern sky. it was about 45 degrees from the horizon and it was really bright! it was huge. like a baby aspirin at arms length. it was a yellowish amber orange color. and very sparkly. i grabbed for the camcorder and the bastard vanished. just quickly grew smaller and then vanished. and there was nothing where it had been. no craft or anything. there was enough moonlight that i could have seen a big craft but there was nothing. this is what sometimes happens so i got the camcorder up for more. they usually start to pop in, one by one till 2 or 3 or more appear and then they pop out the same way. well, this one was the only one. no more came. something was up. within a few minutes the sky was absolutely filled with what i called "fireflies". they were small jet aircraft. i could hear them. they were flying in double "v" formations and they were all over the sky where the light has just been. i watched as they made several sweeps of the area. 3 or 4 would break formation and swing back around toward the south and then make a tight turn back to the north. they did not have their red and green wing lights on but they did have on their strobes, so i could follow them, but it made it harder. that "firefly" effect was crazy! they were everywhere! damn, more started showing up and i had a hard time counting them or keeping track of all of them! the sky was crawling with aircraft! unbelievable!!!! after a few minutes they broke away and started moving to the north in small groups. what a show this was!!! while this was going on, i called glenn means, in peru. i had him on the phone telling him what i was seeing so you can ask him about the freaked out tone in my voice!  i had a weird feeling about what i was seeing. like something was wrong. something was up. something big. for the record, i was sitting in the parking lot at jackson morrow, the lot by the volley ball nets. i was facing the west and scanning the sky from north to south.. i was just west of us 31 at center road. (300s)

after the jets left and it seemed as if there wasn't going to be any more obol tonight, i took my cameras and went home. once i arrived, i stood outside for a few minutes, camera in hand, watching. waiting for something i could feel in the air. at about 10:10 pm i finally gave up and came in. i got my jammies on and went into my office to work.

at precisely 10:24 pm there was a tremendous explosion outside my window. the window shook, my chair shook, my monitor shook, and it sounded like something fell on my roof and then off. (i need to go outside and see if there is anything or anybody laying in my yard!) i thought i had seen a flash of light out the window in my office that faces southwest. it all happened so fast i can't remember if i saw the flash before or after the explosion. i jumped up and ran in to the bedroom and woke dave up screaming, "something is wrong, something is wrong!" i had the hair standing up all over my body. i still do! about 5 minutes later my son,  casey, called me. he is at the cab company in town. he says, "mom, are you guys okay?" i said, "yeah, why?" and he proceeds to tell me that a plane has crashed close to our house! i jumped up and ran into the bedroom to tell dave and then i called glen back. i ran outside to see if i can smell anything or see anything. i can't do either. i do hear dogs howling and barking like mad again.

so i go back inside and up to my office to flip on the tv because it's 11 pm now and the news is coming on. first off the bat is a breaking news: explosion in tipton county at the howard/tipton county line! they had a caller from kokomo on the phone.  she said that someone reported seeing 2 bright flashes of light and then the explosion happened. and the report said there was much debris strewn about the area. now they've come back on and said the faa in indianapolis reports no missing planes!

i am here to tell you right now, that explosion has something to do with the military and that bright amber orange light i saw tonight. i saw the light! i saw the jets scramble and sweep the area after the light disappeared. i have a strong feeling those military jets and that bright light have something to do with this crash. i witnessed something tonight.  i have been thinking about skywatching all day today. i knew i was going out tonight and i had a strong feeling i was going to see something but i didn't think it was gonna be like this! i tell you there were at least 10 military jets sweeping that area after the light appeared and they were flying without their wing lights on. something was up and i have no doubt this crash is related to what i saw
content.summary: Orange amber ball of light and tons of military jets and something crashed!!!!!!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: I was working in dix hills, suffolk county, new york. i was in a customers back yard at 8:30 pm on 4-16-08, which i have been to before- it's on a hill with a schoolyard below. i was doing repairs on their swimming pool. i noticed in between the trees in the distance 5-7 bright lights. they were white, red, blue-green and orange. i noticed them pretty quickly because it was so dark in the yard. looking at it quickly kind of looked like it may have been lights on a tall building- but i realized theres no buildings nearby. i watched for a few moments and the lights were on a slight angle- very bright. i continued with my work and looked again and noticed the lights were moving into a circular formation and then seperated into a straight line(resembled what i saw on t.V. about the arizona lights). i took 2 twenty second long videos with my phone ,which shows the lights but the video at night on a cell phone camcorder doesnt really show as well as i saw with my eyes. i thought maybe it could have been planes but of all the planes in this area i have never seen that many at once in the same area and never seen planes that close group together for obvious safety reasons. after a while the lights just seemed to disappear one by one.
content.summary: Saw about 5-7 bright glowing objects seperately, then grouped together.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i left chuts landing located on swift creek, at about 5:15a.M. on a clear pre-dawn starlit morning for duck hunting at klosse's marsh. although i don't remember what phase the moon was in, i was able to navigate the sloughs to klosse's marsh at full speed in my 14" aluminum craft 40 horse powered evinrude motor which pushed us along at 30+ mph. not possible through narrow sloughs unless the starlit conditions are not just right and they were as i did not need my brother who was sitting in the bow to use a spotlight to shine the way. being a short ride of about 3 miles we arrived in the duck blind about 15 minutes later with no change in the black sky back ground and its bright stars. my brother left the boat to go to the blind and i was pulling it onto the small isle we were hunting from. as he approached the blind he said look at the plane coming in to land and i glanced up to see what appeared to be a single large landing light descending as if it were a plane making an approach for landing. i, said yep your right, but he then said there isn't an airport in this area as the la crosse airport was due north of us about 10 miles away, by this time i was walking toward him, all the time watching the bright light descending on a slope that looked like a plane preparing to land at a speed that would seem to verify that. the glide path may have been a couple minutes long as by this time we were standing together when i suggested it may be a helicopter with a search light on. seconds later the bright light stopped mid air about 5-10k feet above the minnesota bluffs. it hovered motionless for about a minute, which confirmed it was as i suggested, a helicopter with its search light on. we then observed it slowly ascending and i said something to the effect i was right again, meaning it was a helicopter, but then half way up to the horizon it went from what one expects to an indescribable speed straight up....Amazing yes, but not as amazing as the perfect right turn at the same speed. its exit took it back towards the same direction that my brother had first seen it, but of course at a altitude i would not venture to guess at. the kicker is just prior to losing sight of this object it appeared to be throwing off sparkles of light. my conclusion and my brothers was we had just witnessed conclusive proof the earth is being visited by exterrestials or by our own kind that have developed the ability to travel back in time. my brother is sharp yet at 72 and i of sound mind have always felt the need to let someone know, hence i have decided to send this to you after listening to a ufo segment on the history channel that mentioned mufon. nothing to back up our story but maybe another unknown duck hunter in klosses marsh that early october morning, but being a combat vet of viet nam i knew how choppers and air craft fly.......They don't and can't do what we saw. it is as vivid to me today as any of my life's experiences, yes that includes combat. just needed to share before time takes its toll on my brother or myself. do what you may with this, but i believe it to be important and factual.
glenn strittmater
content.summary: Most amazing airborne movement ever seen

content.detailedDescription: I know one thing for certain is that there is alot of activity in the night sky no matter where you are.  tonight we saw a large white starlike object in the southern sky and it had some funny colors like blue green orange flickering off of it. it is still visible in the night sky and has not moved.
content.summary: bright white star like object changing colors

content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting in the house a friend called asked if we see the same thing in the sky.. we look and yes we see it too.. flashing lights like a sxtrobe lighht in the sky,, roundish in shape and moving around changing places 
also seemed to come lower towards the ground as well as ,pvomg in and out
content.summary: Flashing light moving coming in and out looks like disco ball

content.detailedDescription:
I was having a cigarette near grubs restaurant just south of the west ave. and dickson st. intersection in downtown fayetteville watching the stars come out. the sun had set not long before and i could barely see blue off to the west. it was a perfectly cloudless evening. it is at that point in time that you can watch the stars just sorta' come out of nowhere. at 9 pm i observed a red glowing object moving into my field of view from just south of due west moving just north of due east. my first thought was that it must be a helicopter because of its altitude and speed. it didn't take long for me to think to myself that it likely wasn't a helicopter because there was no sound and the lighting was unlike any i had seen before (still possibly an apache type military chopper with very little sound, but doubtful because of the colors.)

i observed this object passively until i realized it was out of the ordinary. at that point i oriented myself at my best guess of due south and clapped off a 40 degree field of view to time the object through. 20 seconds, give or take. the object was situated approximately 35 degrees off the horizon and was the size of a dime at arm's length, or .06' and the object appeared, at best guess, to be 1/4 of a mile south of me moving east. if my (and a couple of coworkers) calculations are correct this means that the object was moving east at an altitude of about 924' above my current elevation of roughly 1,300' at a speed of about 158 mph and was 32' in diameter.

the glow of the object was very interesting. it had the appearance of having two separate lights. one on top and one on bottom. the former stayed on constantly while the latter pulsated in brightness without ever going out. while at its brightest i believe i could see the hull of the object in between the two lights. it appeared to be a dull gray behind the red glow. when the object crossed my field of view (due south) however, there was another light. now i was looking at this thing from a left rear perspective and i could see a fairly intense yellowish white glow from behind. (perhaps this is why people seem to think the thing changes colors? changes directional rotation relative to observer, or even pass them leaving them to look at it from another angle?)

once again, i have battled with the thought of a helicopter or even perhaps a small aircraft but i cannot see it. the wind was gentle out of the south at about 5mph. if there was anything to hear the wind would have pushed it my way. considering the oddity of the object and the fairly quiet evening even in downtown i am confident i would have heard something... anything. no sound. there was also a passenger jet passing overhead at the same time and in the same field of view but much, much higher. back to the time of day - the passenger jet was high enough in the sky that it was still catching sunlight. i could see the shape of the jet and even a portion of its contrail. the object in question was low enough and close enough to be completely dark other than the glow of the lights.

at the time of the sighting and afterwards i had no abnormal feelings. i was just really intrigued by the object.

since then i have questioned myself about the altitudes and distances a few times but i am confident in my analysis and near 100% on the math.

this is the fourth time in my life i have observed what, to me, was a ufo but this was probably the most significant considering i have a firm timetable and measurement process to work from. the other times all caught me off guard and two of them were before i ever joined the military and later became a land surveyor.
content.summary: Glowing object passes over low and slow.

content.detailedDescription: Once again - i was outside at work and like always i scan the skys to see if i can spot anymore of these bright star-like objects. i saw two again today spaced about 45 minutes apart. i did look periodically throughout the day on my lunch and regular breaks from work, but only saw the two and they were both heading to the south at a leisurely pace again...However the thing is, i know that these objects are just popping up in the sky out of seemingly nowhere because i can cover the entire visible sky in a few seconds visually and suddenly in a spot in the sky that was empty just a second earlier, one of these star-like things show up in it, usually it just sits there for a few seconds and then starts to move. i see other regular aircraft flying at about the same altitude, but they usually leave a contrail and are identifiable, unlike the star-craft things. something is going on here over phoenix and i would sure like to know what the hell it is...
content.summary: Wow...Why am i seeing ufo's almost every day over phoenix ? this is not a joke i assure you.

content.detailedDescription: Please anyone out there just look up!!!
content.summary: It is due south east from the danvers ma. town

content.detailedDescription: Believe me, i am reluctant to report this as i am my own worst critic when it comes to seeing ufo's in the sky, especially since i am so into the ufo phenomenon.  i've seen several strange lights in the sky's over the years, none of which i truly felt i had enough of to classify as a "ufo".  however, over the past week and a half, several nights, in the exact same direction and skyline, i have seen this object, which behaves unlike any plane i have ever seen!  the first night, about a week and a half ago, i was walking around 9:00pm at night when, on my way home, after star-gazing, i witnessed off in the distance, probably about 100-150ft. away, i noticed a very strange orangish/fire-colored "orb" or "sphere" in the skyline just over the tree-line.  i watched it, thinking it was the planet mars or jupiter and then i saw it moving.  but not just moving, but swaying back and forth, going one direction and then the other.  i started walking faster towards the object and realized there may have been more than one, but i wasn't sure.  i kept approaching until i realized i was getting closer and that it wasn't, unlike a plane which continues typically in a single direction until out of sight, wasn't really going anywhere.  it didn't really change brightness much at first, and then, upon cutting thru some yards, as i got closer, i found it again and as i saw it, it started to glow very bright like a fire and then i lost it.  i didn't see it leave, i just lost it.  two nights later, looking in the exact same direction as the other night, i saw the same object in roughly the same place, however i couldn't really track for long.  that same day, just before a hail storm i saw another strange, white object, soar overhead.  now, a few days pass, and then last night, i caught the very same object in the sky, the same place/same time as i had seen it before.  this time, i decided to track it as long and far as i could.  i got my binoculars and started on my way.  it, again, was unlike any plane i'd ever seen.  you could see it easily moving in the skyline, however, it changed direction a multitude of times, sort of diagnolly moving, like it was searching... it seemed to rotate in brightness... getting very, very bright orange at one point, then lighter and lighter until finally, becoming two little "blips" of a red dot and a whitish-blue dot... when i first saw the "dots" i thought, "that's gotta be a plane", but, i've never seen a plane hover in roughly the same area for over an hour!  i tracked it to the school, and then i lost it.  when i found it about 30 yards in the other direction, i peered thru the binoculars, which, when doing so, it appeared as if it were one single "orb", which had an orangish-fire color overall, but you could also see red, green, blue and purple colors all within the orange of the orb, not to the sides of it!  again, it moved diagnolly thru the horizon and, on foot, i tracked it for over an hour in roughly a 50-100ft. diameter.  it never went too far and it always came back when it did, always moving back and forth, back and forth in the sky, always getting brighter and brighter until it appeared to be on fire and then getting dimmer and dimmer until only one or two slight little "dots" or "blips" appeared... but again, it never left the airspace of the general vicinity and continued in a back and forth motion gradually continuing south/southeast until it was too far for me to continue tracking. at one point, however, it did travel much faster across the treetops to the eastern direction. i have never seen this type of thing before, and my only hesitation was that the object was never within a 100 ft. or less from me... but, it always appears in the same spot around the same time everynight, in the south direction just about rochester rd. and 18 mile.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A sphere of orange/fire-like "orb", which sort of "rotated" its brightness off in the distance, just over tree lines, which moved diagonally over 50ft. space for over an hour.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and a capitol police officer was on the west steps of the us capitol, working, when we noticed something strange flying straight up at about 15,000 feet moving from north to south over the us capitol dome. the object was bright silver in color, disc shape, moving relatively slow and would stop on occasion- there was a bright white flash emitting from it about every minute or so, we couldn't tell if it was from the object or a reflection off of it. the object was flying in a rather odd pattern- it would stop for many seconds make a sharp left or right movement then start moving straight again. at times it looked like it was moving in a zig zag pattern than it would make right angle turns. sorry, its hard to explain. we couldn't figure out what this was because the area it was flying in was restricted air space. the police officer notified his superior about the object but i don't know what they did from there. the object was literally straight up above the capitol dome and was also seen by the tourist that noticed us looking at it. we watched the object for about twenty minutes until it was out of site toward virginia. sorry it took me so long to report this sighting. i happen to run into the police officer who witnessed this sighting with me, so i decided to finally report it.
content.summary: Myself and police officer working at us capitol spotted

content.detailedDescription: I saw this. if you cant see the video i also have it uploaded on youtube username ragenono.
content.summary: I witnessed this outside on my roof march 11

content.detailedDescription: At around 7:24am on 27 march 2008 i was in my kitchen cooking my daughters' breakfast, when i looked out the window and saw several ufos. at first, i thought they were fireflies, as i live in a rural area, but, upon closer examination, i realized that they were far too big to be fireflies and they were far more luminous than any insect i've ever seen. they kept flashing and moving at an incredible pace, and i couldn't take my eyes off of them. at first i was frightened, but then i became awash with a sense of sheer awe. the flashing lasted for about 21 minutes, and the whole time i was riveted. the objects were cigar-shaped and, from a distance, i'd estimate that they were about 7 inches long. my whole family watched as they flew around our yard. and all of the sudden, in a massive and bright flash, they disappeared.
content.summary: Flickering objects flying around

content.detailedDescription: As a child of six years old i was playing in the alley beside our home in the 400 block of third street, evansville, in, in august of 1953. my mother was in the kitchen at the sink which overlooked alley where i was playing. i heard a loud humming sound overhead, there was a large silvery colored globe approx 100reet in . ft in diameter over a tree beside the alley. about fifty foot in the air, the loud humming sound was coming from it. the globe had a band of portal windows that circled around the globe. humanoid figures were pearing out those portals watching me play. my mother seeing the craft sent for my father to get me in the house. she called the police. numerous police cars arrived in moments. the police began firing at the globe with rifles, pistols and shotguns. that went on for about one hour. the craft never seemed to be hit are damaged. then it finally just went straight up into the air until it disappeared. i had a large bushel basket of those shell casings that i picked up out of the alley until i threw them away as a freshman in high school.
content.summary: I wittnessed a ufo being fired upon with small arms by the city police in evansviile in in 1953
